TestCase.Direction: Launch -> Core PS Network -> Core Ranking -> Access Area

RepeatValidation.SqlTest: select rank as 'sqlRank', no_of_errors as 'sqlFailures' from (select rank() over (order by no_of_errors Desc) as rank, no_of_errors, rat, vendor, hierarchy_3, hierarchy_1 from (select count(*) as no_of_errors, rat, vendor, hierarchy_3, hierarchy_1 from (select rat, vendor, hierarchy_3, hierarchy_1 from event_e_lte_err_raw where datetime_id >= '2015-03-19 07:00' and datetime_id < '2014-03-09 21:32' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') union all select rat, vendor, hierarchy_3, hierarchy_1 from event_e_sgeh_err_raw where datetime_id >= '2015-03-19 08:00' and datetime_id < '2014-03-09 21:32' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) rawCount group by rat, vendor, hierarchy_3, hierarchy_1) unionCount) rankView where rat = {ratId} and vendor = '{vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}'

DECLARE @hier321Id unsigned bigint DECLARE @hier3Id unsigned bigint SELECT @hier321Id = (select top 1 hier321_id FROM dim_e_sgeh_hier321 WHERE vendor = '{vendor}' AND hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' AND hierarchy_3 = '{controller}') SELECT @hier3Id = (select top 1 hier3_id FROM dim_e_sgeh_hier321 WHERE vendor = '{vendor}' AND hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' AND hierarchy_3 = '{controller}') IF @hier321Id IS NULL SELECT @hier321Id = CONVERT(INT,'{accessArea}') IF @hier3Id IS NULL SELECT @hier3Id = CONVERT(BIGINT,'{controller}') Select sum(no_of_successes) as 'sqlSuccesses' from event_e_lte_imsi_suc_raw where tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_Tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') and rat = {ratId} and hier321_id in (select @hier321Id) and hier3_id in (select @hier3Id) and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-07-14 18:00' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-07-14 18:30'

select count(*) as 'sqlSuccesses' from event_e_lte_suc_raw where tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_Tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') and rat = {ratId} and vendor = '{vendor}' AND hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' AND hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-07-14 18:00' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-07-14 18:30'

select count(*) as 'sqlFailures' from event_e_lte_err_raw where tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_Tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-07-14 18:00' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-07-14 18:30' and rat = {ratId} and vendor = '{vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and event_id = {eventId}

DECLARE @hier321Id unsigned bigint DECLARE @hier3Id unsigned bigint SELECT @hier321Id = (select top 1 hier321_id FROM dim_e_sgeh_hier321 WHERE vendor = '{1.vendor}' AND hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' AND hierarchy_3 = '{1.controller}') SELECT @hier3Id = (select top 1 hier3_id FROM dim_e_sgeh_hier321 WHERE vendor = '{1.vendor}' AND hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' AND hierarchy_3 = '{1.controller}') IF @hier321Id IS NULL SELECT @hier321Id = CONVERT(INT,'{accessArea}') IF @hier3Id IS NULL SELECT @hier3Id = CONVERT(BIGINT,'{1.controller}') Select sum(no_of_successes) as 'sqlSuccesses' from event_e_lte_imsi_suc_raw where tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_Tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') and rat = {ratId} and hier321_id in (select @hier321Id) and hier3_id in (select @hier3Id) and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-07-14 18:00' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-07-14 18:30' and event_id = {eventId}

select count(*) as 'sqlSuccesses' from event_e_lte_suc_raw where tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_Tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') and rat = {ratId} and vendor = '{1.vendor}' AND hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' AND hierarchy_3 = '{1.controller}' and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-07-14 18:00' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-07-14 18:30' and event_id = {eventId}

select count(distinct(imsi)) as 'sqlImpacted' from event_e_lte_err_raw where tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_Tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-07-14 18:00' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-07-14 18:30' and rat = {ratId} and vendor = '{vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and event_id = {eventId}

select count(*) as 'sqlFailures' from event_e_lte_err_raw where tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_Tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-07-14 18:00' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-07-14 18:30' and rat = {ratId} and vendor = '{vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and event_id = {eventId} and cause_code = {causeCodeId} and subcause_code = {subcauseCodeId} and cause_prot_type = {causeProtId}

select count(distinct(imsi)) as 'sqlImpacted' from event_e_lte_err_raw where tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_Tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-07-14 18:00' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-07-14 18:30' and rat = {ratId} and vendor = '{vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and event_id = {eventId} and cause_code = {causeCodeId} and subcause_code = {subcauseCodeId} and cause_prot_type = {causeProtId}

select tac as 'sqlTac', event_source_name as 'sqlEventSourceName', rat as 'sqlRatID', hierarchy_3 as 'sqlHierarchyThree', hierarchy_1 as 'sqlHierarchyOne', event_id as 'sqlEventID', vendor as 'sqlVendor' from event_e_lte_err_raw where imsi = {imsi} and tac = {tac} and event_time = '{eventTime}' and cause_code = {causeCodeId} and subcause_code = {subcauseCodeId} and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')
RepeatValidation.Validate: tac = sqlTac,sgsnMme = sqlEventSourceName,ratId = sqlRatID,controller = sqlHierarchyThree,accessArea = sqlHierarchyOne,3.eventId = sqlEventID,vendor = sqlVendor

RepeatValidation.SqlTest: select tac as 'sqlTac', event_source_name as 'sqlEventSourceName', rat as 'sqlRatID', hierarchy_3 as 'sqlHierarchyThree', hierarchy_1 as 'sqlHierarchyOne', event_id as 'sqlEventID', vendor as 'sqlVendor' from event_e_lte_err_raw where imsi = {imsi} and tac = {tac} and event_time = '{eventTime}' and cause_code = {causeCodeId} and subcause_code = {subcauseCodeId} and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')
RepeatValidation.Validate: tac = sqlTac,sgsnMme = sqlEventSourceName,ratId = sqlRatID,controller = sqlHierarchyThree,accessArea = sqlHierarchyOne,2.eventId = sqlEventID,vendor = sqlVendor

RepeatValidation.SqlTest: select count(*) as 'sqlOccurrences' from event_e_lte_err_raw where datetime_id >= '2014-06-11 12:30' and datetime_id < '2014-06-11 13:00' and cause_code = {causeCodeId} and subcause_code = {subcauseCodeId} and CAUSE_PROT_TYPE = {causeProtId} and EVENT_RESULT = {5.eventResId} and event_id = {2.eventId} and imsi = {5.imsi}

select tac as 'sqlTac', event_source_name as 'sqlEventSourceName', rat as 'sqlRatID', hierarchy_3 as 'sqlHierarchyThree', hierarchy_1 as 'sqlHierarchyOne', event_id as 'sqlEventID', vendor as 'sqlVendor' from event_e_lte_err_raw where imsi = {5.imsi} and tac = {tac} and event_time = '{eventTime}' and cause_code = {6.causeCodeId} and subcause_code = {6.subcauseCodeId} and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00'
RepeatValidation.Validate: tac = sqlTac,sgsnMme = sqlEventSourceName,ratId = sqlRatID,controller = sqlHierarchyThree,accessArea = sqlHierarchyOne,vendor = sqlVendor,2.eventId = sqlEventID

RepeatValidation.SqlTest: SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlAttachSuccessRate' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 0 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 0 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextActivationSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 1 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlRAUpdateSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 2 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 2 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlInterSGSNMMERAUpdateSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 3 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 3) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100*ISNULL(CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT),0),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCutoffRatio' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT, ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_NET_INIT_DEACTIVATES),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 4 ) AS suc, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlDetachSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 14 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 14 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(ERR_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlServiceRequestFR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 15 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 15 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(ERR_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPagingFR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(PAGING_ATTEMPTS),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 15 AND PAGING_ATTEMPTS > 0 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_PAGING_ATTEMPTS),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 15 AND NO_OF_PAGING_ATTEMPTS > 0 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(CAST(ERR_PAGING_ATTEMPTS AS DECIMAL(16))/ERR_UNIQUE_SUBSCRIBERS,2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPagingAttemptsPerSub' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT IMSI),0) AS ERR_UNIQUE_SUBSCRIBERS, ISNULL(SUM(PAGING_ATTEMPTS),0) AS ERR_PAGING_ATTEMPTS FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT IMSI) AS 'sqlImpactedSubscribers' FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlAttachSuccessRateLTE' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 5 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 5 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPDNConnectionSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 11 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 11 ) AS suc

SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT IMSI),0) AS 'sqlImpactedSubscribersLTE' FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlBearerActivationSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 9 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 9 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(CAST(ERR_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)*100,2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlUEInitiatedServiceRequestFRLTE' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 13 AND PAGING_ATTEMPTS = 0 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 13 AND NO_OF_PAGING_ATTEMPTS = 0 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(CAST(ERR_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)*100,2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPagingFRLTE' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 13 AND PAGING_ATTEMPTS > 0 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 13 AND NO_OF_PAGING_ATTEMPTS > 0 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlTrackingAreaUpdateSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 8 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 8 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 1 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlInterMMETrackingAreaUpdateSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 8 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 0 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 8 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 0 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlXTwoBasedHandover' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 2 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 2 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlXTwoBasedHOWithoutSGWRelocation' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 1 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextActivationSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 1 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100*ISNULL(CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT),0),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCutoffRatio' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT, ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_NET_INIT_DEACTIVATES),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 4 ) AS suc, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlDetachSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 14 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 14 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(ERR_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPagingFR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(PAGING_ATTEMPTS),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 15 AND PAGING_ATTEMPTS > 0 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_PAGING_ATTEMPTS),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 15 AND NO_OF_PAGING_ATTEMPTS > 0 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(CAST(ERR_PAGING_ATTEMPTS AS DECIMAL(16))/ERR_UNIQUE_SUBSCRIBERS,2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPagingAttemptsPerSub' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT IMSI),0) AS ERR_UNIQUE_SUBSCRIBERS, ISNULL(SUM(PAGING_ATTEMPTS),0) AS ERR_PAGING_ATTEMPTS FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlXTwoBasedHOWithoutSGWRelocation' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 1 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlXTwoBasedHOWithSGWRelocation' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 0 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 0 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlSOneBasedHandover' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM Event_E_lte_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 7 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND rat = {2.ratId} and vendor = '{2.vendor}' and hierarchy_3 = '{2.controller}' and hierarchy_1 = '{2.accessArea}' AND EVENT_ID = 7 AND EVENT_SUBTYPE_ID = 7 ) AS suc
